ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer

gear.name: Loaf pan or round baking dish

enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook to understand this is a quick bread: minimal mixing yields tender crumb, and the beer provides both flavor and leavening.
